vc-config-provider.description:
Config Provider is used for providing global configurations, which enables your entire application to access these configurations everywhere.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/vc-config-provider/#vcconfigprovider)

vc-entity.description:
Load the solid graphics. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.Entity` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/vc-entity/#vcentity)

vc-layer-imagery.description:
Loading an image layer is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.ImageryLayer` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/vc-layer-imagery/#vclayerimagery)

vc-viewer.description:
The basic component for building a `Cesium` application, which is essentially a DOM node initialized by `Cesium.Viewer`, which is used to mount other DOM nodes or subcomponents.The `Cesium` and `Viewer` instances returned from the `ready` event of `vc-viewer` are used for Cesium API development. You can also get the `creatingPromise` object of the component through the `ref` template reference to get the Viewer instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/vc-viewer/#vcviewer)

vc-analyses.description:
Load the analysis tool components. Including sightline analysis, viewshed analysis

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/analyses/vc-analyses/#vcanalyses)

vc-analysis-flood.description:
Loading the flood analysis component. The essence is to use `vc-primitive-classification` and `vc-geometry-polygon` to dynamically modify the `extrudedHeight` property of `vc-geometry-polygon` to stretch it into a closed volume object, as a simple flood analysis simulation.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/analyses/vc-analysis-flood/#vcanalysisflood)

vc-drawings.description:
Load the drawing tool components. Supports drawing points, polylines, polygons, rectangles, regular polygons, and circles.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/analyses/vc-drawings/#vcdrawings)

vc-measurements.description:
Load measurement tool components, including distance measurement, component distance measurement, polyline distance measurement, horizontal distance measurement, vertical distance measurement, height measurement, area measurement, and point coordinate measurement.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/analyses/vc-measurements/#vcmeasurements)

vc-navigation-sm.description:
The navigation component that mimics the supermap. It is composed of `vc-compass-sm` and `vc-zoom-control-sm`.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/controls/vc-navigation-sm/#vcnavigationsm)

vc-navigation.description:
Navigation components, including compass, zoom, other floating buttons, position and distance scale toolbar controls. It is composed of `vc-compass`, `vc-zoom-control`, `vc-print`, `vc-mylocation`, `vc-status-bar`, and `vc-distance-legend`.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/controls/vc-navigation/#vcnavigation)

vc-selection-indicator.description:
Load a custom selector component to replace the selectionIndicator that comes with Cesium.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/controls/vc-selection-indicator/#vcselectionindicator)

vc-datasource-custom.description:
Load a custom datasource. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CustomDataSource` instance and manually managing a group of entity objects.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/datasources/vc-datasource-custom/#vcdatasourcecustom)

vc-datasource-geojson.description:
Load the data source in the format of [GeoJSON]

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/datasources/vc-datasource-geojson/#vcdatasourcegeojson)

vc-datasource-kml.description:
Load the data source in KML

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/datasources/vc-datasource-kml/#vcdatasourcekml)

vc-geometry-box-outline.description:
Loading a box geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.BoxOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-box/#vcgeometryboxoutline)

vc-geometry-box.description:
Loading a box geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.BoxGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-box/#vcgeometrybox)

vc-geometry-cicle-outline.description:
Loading the circle geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CircleOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-circle/#vcgeometrycicleoutline)

vc-geometry-circle.description:
Loading a circle geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CircleGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-circle/#vcgeometrycircle)

vc-geometry-corridor-outline.description:
Loading a corridor geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CorridorOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-corridor/#vcgeometrycorridoroutline)

vc-geometry-polygon-coplanar-outline.description:
Loading a coplanar polygon geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CircleOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-polygon-coplanar/#vcgeometrypolygoncoplanaroutline)

vc-geometry-corridor.description:
Loading a corridor geometry is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CorridorGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-corridor/#vcgeometrycorridor)

vc-geometry-cylinder-outline.description:
Loading a cylinder geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CylinderOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-cylinder/#vcgeometrycylinderoutline)

vc-geometry-cylinder.description:
Loading a cylinder geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CylinderGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-cylinder/#vcgeometrycylinder)

vc-geometry-ellipse-outline.description:
Loading an ellipse geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.EllipseOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-ellipse/#vcgeometryellipseoutline)

vc-geometry-ellipse.description:
Loading an ellipse geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.EllipseGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-ellipse/#vcgeometryellipse)

vc-geometry-ellipsoid-outline.description:
Loading a ellipsoid geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.EllipsoidOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-ellipsoid/#vcgeometryellipsoidoutline)

vc-geometry-ellipsoid.description:
Loading a ellipsoid geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.EllipsoidGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-ellipsoid/#vcgeometryellipsoid)

vc-geometry-frustum-outline.description:
Loading a frustum geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.FrustumOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-frustum/#vcgeometryfrustumoutline)

vc-geometry-frustum.description:
Loading a frustum geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.FrustumGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-frustum/#vcgeometryfrustum)

vc-geometry-ground-polyline.description:
Loading a polyline geometry on terrain or 3D Tiles. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.GroundPolylineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-ground-polyline/#vcgeometrygroundpolyline)

vc-geometry-instance.description:
Loading a geometry instance, which allows one Geometry object to be positions in several different locations and colored uniquely. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.GeometryInstance` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-instance/#vcgeometryinstance)

vc-geometry-plane-outline.description:
Loading a plane geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PlaneOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-plane/#vcgeometryplaneoutline)

vc-geometry-plane.description:
Loading a plane geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PlaneGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-plane/#vcgeometryplane)

vc-geometry-polygon-coplanar.description:
Loading a coplanar polygon geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CoplanarPolygonGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-polygon-coplanar/#vcgeometrypolygoncoplanar)

vc-geometry-polygon-outline.description:
Loading a polygon geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PolygonOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-polygon/#vcgeometrypolygonoutline)

vc-geometry-polygon.description:
Loading a polygon geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PolygonGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-polygon/#vcgeometrypolygon)

vc-geometry-polyline-volume-outline.description:
Loading a polyline with a volume outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PolylineVolumeOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-polyline-volume/#vcgeometrypolylinevolumeoutline)

vc-geometry-polyline-volume.description:
Loading a polyline with a volume

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-polyline-volume/#vcgeometrypolylinevolume)

vc-geometry-polyline.description:
Loading a polyline geometry modeled as a line strip. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PolylineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-polyline/#vcgeometrypolyline)

vc-geometry-rectangle-outline.description:
Loading a rectangle geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CircleOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-rectangle/#vcgeometryrectangleoutline)

vc-geometry-rectangle.description:
Loading a rectangle geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.RectangleGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-rectangle/#vcgeometryrectangle)

vc-geometry-simple-polyline.description:
Loading a polyline geometry modeled as a line strip. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.SimplePolylineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-simple-polyline/#vcgeometrysimplepolyline)

vc-geometry-sphere-outline.description:
Loading a sphere geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.SphereOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-sphere/#vcgeometrysphereoutline)

vc-geometry-sphere.description:
Loading a sphere geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.SphereGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-sphere/#vcgeometrysphere)

vc-geometry-wall-outline.description:
Loading a wall geometry outline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.WallOutlineGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-wall/#vcgeometrywalloutline)

vc-geometry-wall.description:
Loading a wall geometry. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.WallGeometry` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/geometries/vc-geometry-wall/#vcgeometrywall)

vc-graphics-billboard.description:
Loading a billboard graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.BillboardGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-billboard/#vcgraphicsbillboard)

vc-graphics-box.description:
Loading a box graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.BoxGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-box/#vcgraphicsbox)

vc-graphics-corridor.description:
Loading a corridor graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CorridorGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-corridor/#vcgraphicscorridor)

vc-graphics-cylinder.description:
Loading a cylinder graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CylinderGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-cylinder/#vcgraphicscylinder)

vc-graphics-ellipse.description:
Loading a ellipse graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.EllipseGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-ellipse/#vcgraphicsellipse)

vc-graphics-ellipsoid.description:
Loading an ellipsoid graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.EllipsoidGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-ellipsoid/#vcgraphicsellipsoid)

vc-graphics-label.description:
Loading a label graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.LabelGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-label/#vcgraphicslabel)

vc-graphics-model.description:
Loading the model graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.ModelGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-model/#vcgraphicsmodel)

vc-graphics-path.description:
Loading a path graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PathGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-path/#vcgraphicspath)

vc-graphics-plane.description:
Loading a plane graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PlaneGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-plane/#vcgraphicsplane)

vc-graphics-point.description:
Loading the point graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PointGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-point/#vcgraphicspoint)

vc-graphics-polygon.description:
Loading a polygon graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PolygonGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-polygon/#vcgraphicspolygon)

vc-graphics-polyline-volume.description:
Loading a polyline volume graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PolylineVolumeGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-polyline-volume/#vcgraphicspolylinevolume)

vc-graphics-polyline.description:
Loading a polyline graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PolylineGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-polyline/#vcgraphicspolyline)

vc-graphics-rectangle.description:
Loading a rectangle graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.RectangleGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-rectangle/#vcgraphicsrectangle)

vc-graphics-wall.description:
Loading a wall graphic. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.WallGraphics` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/graphics/vc-graphics-wall/#vcgraphicswall)

vc-overlay-echarts.description:
Load the Echart overlay according to the Cesium coordinate system.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/overlays/vc-overlay-echarts/#vcoverlayecharts)

vc-overlay-heatmap.description:
Load a heatmap overlay to viewer.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/overlays/vc-overlay-heatmap/#vcoverlayheatmap)

vc-overlay-html.description:
Load HTML element overlays by geographic location.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/overlays/vc-overlay-html/#vcoverlayhtml)

vc-overlay-windmap.description:
Load a windmap overlay to viewer.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/overlays/vc-overlay-windmap/#vcoverlaywindmap)

vc-post-process-stage-collection.description:
Load a collection of PostProcessStage effects and manage a group of PostProcessStage effects.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/post-processes/vc-post-process-stage-collection/#vcpostprocessstagecollection)

vc-post-process-stage-scan.description:
Packaged scanning effects, radar scanning and circular scanning.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/post-processes/vc-post-process-stage-scan/#vcpostprocessstagescan)

vc-post-process-stage.description:
Loading post-processing effects. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PostProcessStage` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/post-processes/vc-post-process-stage/#vcpostprocessstage)

vc-billboard.description:
Loading a viewport-aligned image positioned in the 3D scene. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.Billboard` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-billboard/#vcbillboard)

vc-collection-billboard.description:
Loading a renderable collection of billboards. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.BillboardCollection` instance. It is recommended to use the `billboards` prop to express when rendering massive billboards.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-billboard/#vccollectionbillboard)

vc-collection-cloud.description:
Loading a cloud primitive collection is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CloudCollection` instance. When rendering multiple cloud primitives, it is recommended to use the `clouds` attribute.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-cloud/#vccollectioncloud)

vc-cumulus-cloud.description:
Loading cumulus cloud. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CumulusCloud` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-cloud/#vccumuluscloud)

vc-label.description:
Loading a viewport-aligned text positioned in the 3D scene. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.Label` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-label/#vclabel)

vc-collection-label.description:
Loading a renderable collection of labels. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.LabelCollection` instance. It is recommended to use the `labels` prop to express when rendering massive labels.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-label/#vccollectionlabel)

vc-point.description:
Loading a graphical point positioned in the 3D scene. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PointPrimitive` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-point/#vcpoint)

vc-collection-point.description:
Loading a renderable collection of points. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PointPrimitiveCollection` instance. It is recommended to use the `points` prop to express when rendering massive points.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-point/#vccollectionpoint)

vc-polyline.description:
Loading a renderable polyline. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.Polyline` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-polyline/#vcpolyline)

vc-collection-polyline.description:
Loading a renderable collection of polylines. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PolylineCollection` instance. It is recommended to use the `polylines` prop to express when rendering massive polylines.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-polyline/#vccollectionpolyline)

vc-polygon.description:
Loading the polygon primitive. It is equivalent to initializing a `PolygonPrimitive` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-primitive/#vcpolygon)

vc-collection-primitive.description:
Loading a collection of primitives. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.PrimitiveCollection` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-collection-primitive/#vccollectionprimitive)

vc-primitive-classification.description:
Loading a volume enclosing geometry in the Scene to be highlighted. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.ClassificationPrimitive` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-primitive-classification/#vcprimitiveclassification)

vc-primitive-ground-polyline.description:
Loading a polyline draped over the terrain or 3D Tiles in the Scene. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.GroundPolylinePrimitive` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-primitive-ground-polyline/#vcprimitivegroundpolyline)

vc-primitive-ground.description:
Loading a geometry draped over terrain or 3D Tiles in the Scene. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.GroundPrimitive` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-primitive-ground/#vcprimitiveground)

vc-primitive-model.description:
Loading a 3D model based on glTF, the runtime asset format for WebGL, OpenGL ES, and OpenGL. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.Model` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-primitive-model/#vcprimitivemodel)

vc-primitive-particle.description:
Loading a ParticleSystem manages the updating and display of a collection of particles. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.ParticleSystem` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-primitive-particle/#vcprimitiveparticle)

vc-primitive-tileset.description:
Loading a 3D Tiles tileset, used for streaming massive heterogeneous 3D geospatial datasets. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.Cesium3DTileset` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-primitive-tileset/#vcprimitivetileset)

vc-primitive.description:
Loading a geometry of primitive, the geometry can be from a single `GeometryInstance` or from an array of instances, or `vc-geometry-xxx` component. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.Primitive` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/primitives/vc-primitive/#vcprimitive)

vc-imagery-provider-arcgis.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery hosted by an ArcGIS MapServer. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.ArcGisMapServerImageryProvider` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-arcgis/#vcimageryproviderarcgis)

vc-imagery-provider-baidu.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery hosted by Baidu Map. You can use `projectionTransforms` to transform the coordinates of the tiles.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-baidu/#vcimageryproviderbaidu)

vc-imagery-provider-bing.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider using the Bing Maps Imagery REST API. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.BingMapsImageryProvider` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-bing/#vcimageryproviderbing)

vc-imagery-provider-ion.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider using the Cesium ion REST API. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.IonImageryProvider` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-ion/#vcimageryproviderion)

vc-imagery-provider-mapbox.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery hosted by Mapbox. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.MapboxStyleImageryProvider` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-mapbox/#vcimageryprovidermapbox)

vc-imagery-provider-osm.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery hosted by OpenStreetMap or another provider of Slippy tiles. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.OpenStreetMapImageryProvider` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-osm/#vcimageryproviderosm)

vc-imagery-provider-singletile.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides a single, top-level imagery tile. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.SingleTileImageryProvider` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-singletile/#vcimageryprovidersingletile)

vc-imagery-provider-supermap.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery hosted by a SuperMap iServer.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-supermap/#vcimageryprovidersupermap)

vc-imagery-provider-tianditu.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery hosted by a Tianditu REST API.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-tianditu/#vcimageryprovidertianditu)

vc-imagery-provider-tms.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery as generated by [MapTiler]

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-tms/#vcimageryprovidertms)

vc-imagery-provider-urltemplate.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides imagery by requesting tiles using a specified URL template. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.UrlTemplateImageryProvider` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-urltemplate/#vcimageryproviderurltemplate)

vc-imagery-provider-wms.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery hosted by a Web Map Service

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-wms/#vcimageryproviderwms)

vc-imagery-provider-wmts.description:
Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery served by [WMTS 1.0.0]

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-imagery-provider-wmts/#vcimageryproviderwmts)

vc-terrain-provider-arcgis.description:
Loading a terrain provider that produces terrain geometry by tessellating height maps retrieved from Elevation Tiles of an ArcGIS ImageService. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.ArcGISTiledElevationTerrainProvider` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-terrain-provider-arcgis/#vcterrainproviderarcgis)

vc-terrain-provider-cesium.description:
Loading a terrain provider that accesses terrain data in a Cesium terrain format. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CesiumTerrainProvider` instance. If the `url` is empty, the CesiumIon online global terrain will be loaded via `Cesium.createWorldTerrain` by default. CesiumIon authorization is required. For details, go to [`https://cesium.com/ion/`]

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-terrain-provider-cesium/#vcterrainprovidercesium)

vc-terrain-provider-tianditu.description:
Loading a terrain provider that produces terrain geometry by tessellating height maps retrieved from Elevation Tiles of an Tianditu REST API.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-terrain-provider-tianditu/#vcterrainprovidertianditu)

vc-terrain-provider-vr-theworld.description:
Loading a terrain provider that that produces terrain geometry by tessellating height maps retrieved from a VT MK VR-TheWorld server. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.VRTheWorldTerrainProvider` instance.

[Docs](https://zouyaoji.top/vue-cesium/#/en-US/component/providers/vc-terrain-provider-vr-theworld/#vcterrainprovidervrtheworld)
